text: The iPhone 16e delivers exceptional performance with its powerful A18 chip and stunning 6.1-inch OLED display. The 48MP camera captures brilliant photos, and its impressive battery life ensures all-day usage.
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

text:
Its been Close to 1 week and I am happy with the purchase. Got a good exchange offer with my old IPhone 8 and with the bank offer, the price came down to around 45K for 128GB model.

Battery backup is very good.
Light Weight and build quality is good.
Camera is good to the levell what we are paying.
Except wide angle camera, getting everything what IPhone 16 has to offer.
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

text:
The phone was repeatedly hanging. Repeatedly asked Amazon for replacement, but citing some or the other technical issue, they did not replace. Once the the return window was closed, they said they could not help. Had to then approach Apple customer care.

0. Defective product delivered
1. Amazon made it almost impossible to reach their customer service by making the waiting period for call very long and repeatedly cutting the call.
2. Citing technical issues they did not replace the phone till the replacement window was closed
3. Once the replacement window closed, they blamed me for the delay in getting the product replaced
4. Very little support offered for claiming warranty
title: 1.0 out of 5 stars

text:
Very Nice Phone.
Reliable and Durable.
title: 4.0 out of 5 stars

title: 3.0 out of 5 stars

text: Practically perfect. All day battery with power performance.
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

text: Heating issue. Sometimes display is good off while getting call that's awkward. Unable to see the screen in those times. Whenever we make a call to any person or from any network it showing like person picking call but Unable to hear anything from caller side. I have used esim and physical sim. Rest all ok. I have iPhone 16 and 16e. iPhone 16 is best. Only best part of iPhone 16e is battery backup.
